title: ANTONIO BROWN RELEASED BY RAIDERS - Emergency Podcast (9/7)
description:
Antonio Brown is gone from Oakland! Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough are back for another emergency podcastto  give their immediate reaction on the latest in the AB saga, as the Raiders released the star WR who they acquired this offseason. The guys discuss a wild Friday night of developments, what made the Raiders finally cut ties and what could be next for Brown. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
